Package de.esoco.lib.security

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AuthenticationService
    Definition of services that perform user authentication based on data in a relatable object.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BCrypt
    BCrypt implements OpenBSD-style Blowfish password hashing using the scheme described in "A Future-Adaptable Password Scheme" by Niels Provos and David Mazieres.
    Security
    Contains static helper methods for typical security tasks like the creation of cryptographic certificates and keys and configuring Java security key stores and SSL contexts.
    SecurityRelationTypes
    Contains security-related relation types.
